title: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when choosing SWT.MULTI
description: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when choosing SWT.MULTI. Somehow I don't think it's supposed to do that.
OB: When clicking on other buttons, it also makes the bell sound.
EB: The ControlExampleText should not make a bell sound when choosing SWT.MULTI or clicking on other buttons.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Build F1 (20020521) on Win2K.
2. Open the SWT example ControlExample.
3. Go to the Text tab.
4. Click on Styles SWT.SINGLE.
5. Click on Styles SWT.MULTI.
